overview: Socio-geographic explorations on the periphery of Addis Ababa, run through by a variety of borders and rifts â€“ between agrarian and urban spatial practices, between economic and linguistic floes, between perspective and dilemma. A polyphonic audiovisual narrative of people who are forced to experience the impetuous urbanisation of African societies the hard way, recorded as a case study that expands into a complex allegory.
title: Rift Finfinnee
